happy.description: It makes me happy to spend time with my cat, Soup.
happy.story: I received soup from the Cat Delivery System, also known as the CDS, in around September of 2024. Soup is now a whopping nine pounds and a really good boy. He loves to have his head and his chin scratched, but also loves his personal space, much like myself. He's been a wonderful addition to the family and I love him to death, even when he get's a little hangry (hungry-angry) from time to time.

excited.description: It makes me excited to watch my new favorite shows when they release.
excited.story: I have most recently watched Breaking Bad, which is a phenomenal show on its own, and now I have began watching "Better Call Saul" on Netflix. It's a slower paced show than Breaking Bad but expands on the universe the show is set in. Overall it's been a fun new show and I look forward to watching the rest of it.

bored.description: I am bored whenever I no longer have anything to do in my favorite games.
bored.story: I have most recently completed Outer Wilds, which is a space simulation / exploration game with a highly intricate story. It was incredibly fun to play through and explore more of the world and its mysteries. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who loves space and exploration. However, now that I have finished the game, I no longer get to enjoy it like I was able to for the first time.

cool.description: I feel cool creating projects to show off to people.
cool.story: My most recent project that I have completed was my level "SPITZER", which I created completely in the game Geometry Dash. This project was started two years ago and over the course of the winter break I came back and finished the project. A total of 320 hours were spent working on the project and I'm very happy with how it turned out. A video of the level can be found if you click the image above.

loving.description: I feel loving towards my girlfriend Brittany, who I have had the pleasure of spending over a year with now.
loving.story: Brittany and I have been together for over a year now. Relationships are a lot of work but worth the effort, at least that's what I have learned. We most recently went on a trip to Georgia to spend time with her Grandparents. We also went to see the Georgia Aquarium, which was a one of a kind experience.

sad.description: I feel sad whenever I have to leave home for long periods of time.
sad.story: I have an upcoming deployment to the Mexico Border with the Army National Guard. I am sad that I will have to spend a year away from home, but I'm excited for the new experience that's quickly approaching. I leave in October with the rest of my unit to Texas, which is one of the places I will be stationed.
